overview: Size isn’t everything, of course – except when it comes to this superb collection of oversexed fuckers! Fact is, these guys are simply obsessed with big cocks; and, not content with being mega-hung themselves, spend every moment of their time dreaming about the next beefy, uncut shaft heading their way. Of which there are plenty, as one mammoth dick after another stretches hungry throats and asses, coating all and sundry in hot, fresh jizz! Size-queens be warned: this is one monster of a movie in every possible sense!!
title: Oversized!
